name: Faux Amis
description:
Talk to aloof NPCs, solve puzzles, and dig through the private property of others without their permission in this evasive ZZT adventure.

ZIP contents:

ZZT World Files:

FAUXAMIS.ZZT - The main game. (v1.01)
FAUXBETA.ZZT - Public beta version (5 Jul 2018.)
FAUXUNUS.ZZT - A collection of unused boards.

Text Files:

FAUXAMIS.TXT - Information about the game.
FAUXWALK.TXT - Puzzle walkthrough.
